message:
Today is the day we are asking for your help. Not sure how? It can be as simple a sharing a picture. In this album, there are 30 photos with facts about Human Trafficking. Pick one and share. Knowlege is power and we can help prevent this terrible crime. 
Remember to use the #GiveFreedom & #HelpERASE
Thank you! 
http://bit.ly/2uJJVFc
